javadoc.text:
* Lower triangular packed matrix. In contrast with{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.LowerTriangDenseMatrix LowerTriangDenseMatrix}, * this matrix exploits the sparsity by only storing about half the matrix. As * such, the triangular matrix *
* *
* a11 * * * * *
* a21 * a22 * * * *
* a31 * a32 * a33 * * *
* a41 * a42 * a43 * a44 * * * *
* is packed as follows: * *
* *
* a11 * a21 * a31 * a41 * a22 * a32 * a42 * a33 * a43 * a44 * * *

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the entries of the relevant * part are copied
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the entries of the relevant * part are copied
deepTrue if the copy is deep, else false (giving a shallow copy). * For shallow copies, A must be a packed matrix
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the entries of the relevant * part are copied
deepTrue if the copy is deep, else false (giving a shallow copy). * For shallow copies, A must be a packed matrix

javadoc.text: * Checks the row and column indices, and returns the linear data index
